title: Wordle
content:
Found [this website](http://web.archive.org/web/20120625021939/http:/wordle.net/) today. Thought you all would enjoy.

You put in your own text or insert an RSS feed and it produces a word cloud for you. There are some interesting submissions in the gallery, such as presidential candidates' speeches.
author: dyana

comments.content: Shouldn't that be Wardle? Tiffany, I think they misspelled your name.
Haha. No. There is a site called Wordle. But, here is one of [Wardle's Wordles](http://web.archive.org/web/20120625021939/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/typegirl/2591209840/in/photostream/).
How did I miss that before?
